3rdparty toolkit ZeroRPC http://zerorpc.dotcloud.com/ Zeromq 是基于zeromq、gevent和 msgpack开发的分布式RPC框架. 表情符号 emoji import emoji result = emoji.emojize('Python is :thumbs_up:') print(result) # 'Python is '
# You can also reverse this: result = emoji.demojize('Python is ') print(result)
